task_background: Prepare the high-frequency trading floor for a critical market opening by ensuring all equipment is functional, organized, and ready for use.

tasks.task_description: Place the unlabeled USB drive (usb_drive_1) on the server rack (server_rack_1).
Turn on the central LED ticker wall (led_wall_1).
Find the red-capped USB drive with the inscription 'ALGO v3.2' and install it in the overheating server (overheating_server_1).
Use the spare fan kit (fan_kit_1) to cool the overheating server (overheating_server_1).
Use the Torx T15 screwdriver (screwdriver_1) to install the spare fan kit (fan_kit_1) in the overheating server (overheating_server_1).
Find the only flashing red device in the trading desk (panic_button_1) and deactivate it using the panic button terminal (panic_button_1).
Have robot_1 and robot_2 cooperate to open the 8-person trading desk (trading_desk_1).
Have robot_1 and robot_2 cooperate to turn on the central LED ticker wall (led_wall_1).
Move the emergency battery backup (battery_backup_1) to the main trading floor.
Move the server rack (server_rack_1) to the research pod 1.
Cooperatively move the heavy bookshelf (bookshelf_1) that is currently closed to the break room.
Cooperatively move the heavy mini fridge (mini_fridge_1) that is currently full to the research pod 2.
